item.title: Fresh Forte - This Land Is Your Land
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by The Little Singers
Original video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QCBimlsLyK8
This version was made to reflect the use of KIDS Ukulele Strings. I also have a non-kids video featuring Elizabeth Mitchell's performance at https://youtu.be/66JMZve5Uvs
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com. The colored font matches Aquila KIDS ukulele strings.
